document.full_text: americans are more pessimistic about the u.s. economic outlook than they have been since the start of the obama administration and most believe the united states is on the wrong track, according to a new york times/cbs news poll released on thursday.
document.title: americans hold dim view of u.s. economic outlook: poll
lines_and_colors: americans are more pessimistic about the u.s. economic outlook than they have been since the start of the obama administration and most believe the united states is on the wrong track, according to a new york times/cbs news poll released on thursday.
